description:
Designed by Ryan McKibbin, the Snap range of tables, chairs and benches features shrewd use of plywood's natural flexibility to cleverly create snap-together, interlocking joins for easy tools-free assembly and disassembly.

Ryan's work is rooted in traditional techniques and his interest in exploring the potential of CAD/CAM. He has extensive knowledge of Rhino3D and related software and teaches Furniture Design and Digital Fabrication at the Catholic University’s School of Architecture and Planning in Washington DC.
name: Snap
